be.ac.umons.model

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorMap, Map

    public interface Model
    The model of the game

      • getHexagon

        Hexagon getHexagon(Pos pos)
        Get the hexagon located on a given position of the map
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the hexagon
        Returns:
        the hexagon located on the given position of the map

      • getHexagons

        Hexagon[][] getHexagons()
        Get the hexagons of the map as an array of hexagons
        Returns:
        an array containing the hexagons of the map

      • setHexagons

        void setHexagons(Hexagon[][] hexagons)
        Set the hexagons of the map
        Parameters:
        hexagons - an hexagon array containing the hexagons to add in the map

        pos - the position of the hexagon in the map

      • moveHexagon

        void moveHexagon(Pos from,
                 Pos to)
        Move an hexagon from a position in the map to another position
        Parameters:
        from - the original position of the hexagon
        to - the final position of the hexagon

      • swapHexagons

        void swapHexagons(Pos from,
                  Pos to)
        Swap the position of two hexagons in the map
        Parameters:
        from - the position of the first hexagon to swap
        to - the position of the second hexagon to swap

      • getNextPos

        Pos getNextPos(Pos pos,
               Edge edge)
        Get the position relative to another position in the map and the edge between the two positions
        Parameters:
        pos - the initial position
        edge - the edge between the two positions
        Returns:
        the next position

      • sendLaser

        void sendLaser()
        Send the laser from each source in order to detect if the map is in a winning state with hasWon() or in a losing state with hasLost() The path of the laser can be later accessed with getSegments() ()}

      • getSegments

        java.util.List<Segment> getSegments()
        Get an ArrayList of Segment objects containing the path of the laser
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Segment objects containing the path of the laser

      • setReachedTarget

        void setReachedTarget(boolean reached)
        Notify the map that a target has been reached or that a target is not reached anymore
        Parameters:
        reached - whether the target has been reached

      • hasWon

        boolean hasWon()
        Return whether the map is in a winning state
        Returns:
        whether the map is in a winning state

      • hasLost

        boolean hasLost()
        Return whether the map is in a losing state
        Returns:
        whether the map is in a losing state

      • reset

        void reset(int width,
           int height)
        Set the map as an empty map with a width and height
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the map
        height - the height of the map
